message.raw:
Move boilerplate url request code into separate method, and
have that method use urllib module imports compatible with Python 3.

Convert body of HTTP request to bytes before making HTTP request, and
decode response to unicode before doing regex.

Requires testing.

Without seeing MultipartForm, I don't know if it will be OK with receiving
the unicode strings it is now being given in either Python 2 or 3.

Withthout seeing CompileD, I don't know whether it will be ok with one
of the arguments being a bytestring in Python 3.
